scripts.start: echo 'Pushing schema to DB...' && npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss && echo 'Seeding DB...' && prisma db seed && echo 'Starting Service with nodemon...' && node src/index.js
scripts.dev: echo 'Pushing schema to DB...' && npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss && echo 'Seeding DB...' && prisma db seed && echo 'Starting Service with nodemon...' && nodemon src/index.js
